tasks.task: Attending an educational video on agricultural extension.
subtasks: Listening to the instructor introduce themselves.
Following along with the discussion on the roles of agricultural universities.
Understanding the definition of extension service.
Examining examples of extension service activities.
Identifying various roles involved in extension service.
Discussing the necessity of extension research.
Analyzing the focus areas of extension research.
Exploring the concept of extension education.
Differentiating between extension service and extension education.
Recognizing the importance of non-formal education in extension.
Examining the history and origins of the extension concept.
Understanding the terminology variations across different countries.
Reflecting on the significance of transfer of technology in extension.
